data.subject: Implementation of New Document Generation System (DGS)
data.bodyContent:
We are pleased to inform that the new Document Generation System (DGS) is being rolled out effective immediately.

This system enables the generation of uniform, bank-grade PDF documents for all office notes, circulars, and committee recommendations. It ensures consistent branding, security markings, and layout standards across the organization.

All branches and administrative units are requested to start using the system for their proposal submissions.
